cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with designing error correcting codes with support constraints, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It also involves the design of locally repairable codes, which is a topic in distributed systems (cs.DS). The use of cut-set bounds and minimum distance is a topic in coding theory (cs.CC). The paper also discusses the efficiency of decoders, which is a topic in signal processing (cs.SI). Finally, the paper mentions the field size, which is a topic in network information theory (cs.NI).
